modules.description: This module constructs and modifies SMTP server configuration records, supporting authentication, encryption, and certificate verification settings. It works with string values, optional integers, and file paths to configure connection parameters. Concrete use cases include setting up authenticated SMTP clients with TLS and specifying custom certificate authorities for secure email transmission.

This module constructs and sends emails with support for plain text, HTML, and mixed content types. It works with recipient types like To, Cc, and Bcc, and uses SMTP configuration records for secure email transmission. Concrete use cases include sending multi-format emails through authenticated SMTP servers with TLS.
